explains: n. 河边居民；河岸拥有人
wordGroup: riparian vegetation 河岸植被，岸栖植物

sentences.en: That is fraught with difficulties as there is no seabed agreement between the riparian states.
sentences.cn: 在沿岸的国家之间还没有海床协议的情况下，这是困难重重的。

sentences.en: Habitat: riparian. This plant grows at the sunlit margins of moist, humid riparian woodlands, where it climbs trees and other plants.
sentences.cn: 栖息地：河岸。这种植物喜欢生长在潮湿和阳光充足处，潮湿的河岸林地，在那里攀爬树木和其他植物。

sentences.en: Most of the sediment directly enters the headwaters of the Mekong River or is deposited in riparian areas where it is entrained during later floods.
sentences.cn: 大部分泥沙直接进入了湄公河上游或是沉降在河岸地区，被日后的洪水中带走。
